posts.post_content:
Paying CASH MONEY. Take that vacation you wanted. Buy some Trump playing cards. Splurge on a hamburger WITH fries and a drink.

SOLID vg/x OR x CARD

My sugar is up, can't hear, and I'm three years into recovery from my quadruple bypass. Please help an old man finish the last of my 5 sets representing our great hobby from a 19th century perspective.
